abstract.p: Heathrow Express train linking Paddington Station with London's Heathrow Airport offers free trips to US citizens November 18 through 23 as Thanksgiving gift (S)

block.p: The Heathrow Express, a train that links Paddington Station in London with Heathrow Airport, is offering free trips to United States citizens Nov. 18 through 23 as a Thanksgiving gift; just show a United States passport at Heathrow Express ticket offices at the airport or Paddington. The train takes 15 to 22 minutes between London and Heathrow's four terminals. One-way fares are typically $17.70, or $29.50 first class, with a $1.48 discount for online or telephone orders (at $1.48 to a pound). Information: (44-845) 600 1515 or at www .heathrowexpress.co.uk.
